code: import React from"react";import{auth,provider}from'../firebase-config';import{signInWithPopup}from'firebase/auth';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(_ref){var setIsAuth=_ref.setIsAuth;var navigate=useNavigate();var signInWithGoogle=function signInWithGoogle(){signInWithPopup(auth,provider).then(function(result){localStorage.setItem("isAuth",true);setIsAuth(true);navigate("/");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"loginPage",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Sign In with Google to Continue"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"login-with-google-btn",onClick:signInWithGoogle,children:"Sign In with Google"})]});}export default Login;
